translation.en: This morning, we set sail for our next grand adventure, the Galapagos,
translation.de: Wir segeln zu einem neuen Abenteuer, den Galapagos-Inseln,

translation.en: and whatever extraordinary creatures await me on these islands.
translation.de: und den außergewöhnlichen Kreaturen, die mich dort erwarten.

translation.en: Ooh, uh, Ed? This is embarrassing. Um, but you have a little, um...
translation.de: Ed? Das ist peinlich, aber du hast da…

translation.en: -Yeah, right there. You got it. -Uh, I know.
The other flummels are waiting for us.
So, we're late. What's the worst thing that could happen?
translation.de: Wir sind spät dran. Ja und?

translation.en: The countdown to the Flower Festival has begun.
Now, I know we don't have a lot of flowers, but--
But the ones we got are different, dynamic, and--
translation.de: Aber sie sind anders, dynamisch und…

translation.en: Weird. The flowers, you, your brother, all weird.
translation.de: Komisch. Die Blumen, du, dein Bruder, alle komisch.

translation.en: That's why no one wants you around.
Well, Ed, we gave it a shot.
[scoffs] It's fine. I don't care what Mali thinks.
translation.de: Mir ist egal, was Mali denkt.

translation.en: [chuckles] What are you talking about? You care what everybody thinks.
translation.de: Was? Dir ist wichtig, was alle denken.

translation.en: Not right now, because I've got a big surprise for you.
translation.de: Gerade nicht, denn ich habe eine Überraschung.

translation.en: It's an official headdress for my new job.
When we all march up the mountain for the Flower Festival,
I'll be in one of the most important spots...
Because I've been chosen to be...
-No, it's the opposite, it's the finish. -Still, it's an honor.
You know what would make it even better?
translation.de: Weißt du, was noch besser wäre?
Op, ich hab dich lieb, aber ich will

translation.en: but this is my final chance to make a good impression with the rest of the flummels.
translation.de: Op, ich hab dich lieb, aber ich will vor den Flummels gut dastehen.

translation.en: And don't take this the wrong way, but, please, just try not to ruin this for me.
translation.de: Versteh mich nicht falsch, aber mach mir das nicht kaputt.

translation.en: Well, whenever you help, things tend to... unravel.
translation.de: Wenn du hilfst, geht meist etwas… schief.

translation.en: Waterfall fail, mango avalanche, rock in the hole,
the great fire, the greater fire,
mud for dinner, tree skis, the burpening, fish for hands,
the ring thing, bee tornado, bee tornado two: the tropical swarm,
and, of course, Coconut Charlie and the Jackfruit Jam Band.
translation.de: und Coconut Charlie und die Jackfruit Jam Band.

translation.en: So we've had our ups and downs. Mainly downs.
But think of those sweet, sweet occasional ups.
translation.de: Aber denk auch an die Höhen.

translation.en: And besides, you need to stop living in the past...
translation.de: Und lebe nicht in der Vergangenheit,

translation.en: I just wanted to say, I like that spin move you do.
translation.de: Mir gefällt sehr, wie du dich drehst.

translation.en: Oh, thanks! I call it the "Op Pop".
translation.de: Danke! Ich nenne das den "Op Pop".

translation.en: -I can teach you, if you want. -You could?
Sure! Just do what I do.
Bo, what have I told you about wandering off?
translation.de: Bo, was sagte ich über das Weglaufen?

translation.en: Fred, looking good. You working out?
-Did you change your fur? -I combed it.
Get ready to give your undivided attention to the roundest guy around,
translation.de: Schenkt eure ungeteilte Aufmerksamkeit dem Rundesten von allen,

translation.en: the king ring of our hoop troop,
Hey, thank you, Mali. Thanks a bunch, great stuff.
translation.de: Hey, danke, Mali. Danke, vielen Dank.

translation.en: Hey, everybody. All right, a little story just before we begin.
translation.de: Hey, Leute. Eine Geschichte zum Anfang.

translation.en: Last night, I was doing some thinking, I was doing some math.
That guy gets it. I like that guy.
So anywho, I decided our theme this year,
just like every other year, is...
All right. Cheer time is over.
And as always, I, and the Grand Flower Flummel,
translation.de: Wie immer werden ich und die Großblume Flummel

translation.en: will lead us right to the top of the mountain to celebrate.
translation.de: uns für die Feier auf den Berggipfel anführen.

translation.en: big flummels and small flummels, flummels who love the beach,
but especially the part where the sand is a little firmer...
translation.de: vor allem den Teil, wo der Sand fester ist…

translation.en: [grunts] I told you that branch wouldn't hold us. I don't remember you saying that.
translation.de: -Ich sagte doch, der Ast trägt uns nicht. -Hast du das gesagt?

translation.en: We've been demoted to crab poking.
Well, hey, at least you still have your job as the "buddy in the back".
translation.de: Wenigstens bist du noch "Kumpel am Schluss".

translation.en: you're gonna be asked for a lot of dances.
translation.de: wirst du oft zum Tanzen aufgefordert.

translation.en: I get nervous talking to girls that aren't you.
I can't even talk to Vinny since he grew his hair long.
translation.de: Sogar Vinny mit dem langen Haar.

translation.en: Hey, what's-- Looking good. Looking good.
translation.de: Hey, was… Gut siehst du aus.

translation.en: I wanna hear what's been happening.
Hey, Op, I'm coming. Don't you worry. We haven't talked since yesterday.
translation.de: Hey, Op. Ich komme. Seit gestern gibt es viel Neues.

translation.en: So, there's a lot to catch up on.
translation.de: Es gibt also viel zu erzählen.

translation.en: -First off-- -Uh, he's coming in pretty hot.
Towards the beach. All right, where all the Flummels are working.
translation.de: zum Strand. Wo alle Flummels sind.

translation.en: Ah, you're right. Better shoo him off a bit.
[Wally] But let's be honest, it's all just swimming.
You can't call it a school and expect kids to be excited about it.
translation.de: und kein Kind schwimmt gern mit dem Strom.

translation.en: -That's the same thing! -No, that was waving.
-This is a shooing motion. -No, it isn't.
This is a shooing motion! More like this.
And guess what? Mr. Seahorse is having a baby!
-This is shooing motion. -That's what I'm doing.
-No, that's waving. -Drinking sea water makes you go crazy.
But, really, what else am I supposed to drink?
I know blubber is just what it's called, but that doesn't make it any less hurtful.
translation.de: Blubber mag nur ein Wort sein, aber es ist verletzend.

translation.en: Oh, oh, save the Grand Flower Flummel!
Random question. Were you guys waving or shooing?
translation.de: Eine Frage. War das Winken oder Scheuchen?

translation.en: Oh, you two really did it this time.
translation.de: Jetzt habt ihr zwei es geschafft.

translation.en: I really hope Jepson didn't see that.
You know, I'm patient. Oh, yes, I am.
But sometimes a leader has to lead.
And that is why, Op and Ed,
you are forbidden from coming to the Flower Festival!
While we go up the mountain,
why don't you two take some time and think about what you did...
translation.de: und ihr zwei denkt über eure Taten nach.

translation.en: Oh, that's why it's called that.
[Ed] And there goes my last chance to belong.
I know this seems bad, but we can--
[Ed groans] How do you talk me into these things?
I finally understand why this is called
Look, we destroyed all the flowers, right?
So, we're gonna get more flowers no one's ever seen before.
translation.de: Also holen wir viele unbekannte Blumen.

translation.en: They'll have no choice but to forgive us. Now, come on!
translation.de: Dann müssen sie uns vergeben. Komm!

translation.en: It's just a little bit further-- Whoa!
Op! Oh, no. I knew it!
translation.de: Op! Oh nein. Ich wusste es!
Ich bin verängstigt, in der Klemme, allein

translation.en: Okay, well... [laughs] just making small talk. Looks like rain. No, it doesn't.
translation.de: Ich mache nur Konversation. Es sieht nach Regen aus.

translation.en: Whoa, I've never even seen this flower before.
translation.de: Die hier kenne ich nicht mal.

translation.en: -I got this. [grunts] -That means I get to name it.
-[Ed] No, I don't have this. -Opadils. No, that's stupid.
You know what? This may actually work.
For sure, this is totally gonna--
-I think I can reach it. -This is my life.
[Ed] Are you seeing what I'm seeing?
It is amazing! What do you think it is?
translation.de: Es ist toll! Was kann es wohl sein?

translation.en: No idea. I've never seen anything like it.
translation.de: So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen.

translation.en: [Ed] You think it's some kind of new whale?
[Op] Whale? What are you talking about?
-[Ed] What are you talking about? -What are you talking about?
Op, what are you talking about?
I'm talking about this gorgeous, glowing, swirling--
translation.de: Ich rede von der schönen, leuchtenden…

translation.en: Ed! Help! Pull me up. Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa,
-whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa... -Arms tired from poking crabs.
We went into a flower on Flummel Island,
then we came out of a flower in this place.
translation.de: und fielen hier aus einer Blume.

translation.en: No, but it's still pretty wild though.
translation.de: Nein, aber es ist ziemlich verrückt.

translation.en: Hmm, where are my mid-distance bifocals?
Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Wait a minute. Stop.
How did flower picking turn into...
Don't worry. I can fix this.
Op, that mountain you're on is moving.
Oh, hey. Isn't this place great?
translation.de: Hey. Ist es nicht toll hier?

translation.en: We should have never left Desolation Rock.
translation.de: Auf dem Einsamen Felsen war es besser.

translation.en: Your ideas have caused us nothing but trouble.
So, we're doing things my way,
translation.de: Wir machen es auf meine Art,

translation.en: You're the cutest things I've ever seen.
translation.de: Ihr seid ja so was von süß!

translation.en: Do you wanna come home and marry my dolly? And you can marry my cat.
translation.de: Willst du meine Puppe heiraten? Und du meine Katze?

translation.en: Why do you get the cat? I want the cat.
translation.de: Du die Katze? Ich will die Katze.

translation.en: -[gasps] It's you again. -Whoa, whoa, whoa! You got it all wrong.
I'm here to help you guys. Sorry for being so rude back at the house.
translation.de: Ich will euch helfen. Entschuldigung wegen eben.

translation.en: We dogs are very territorial, you know.
-No. We don't know. -We don't know anything.
Well, let's start with the basics then. I'm Clarance and I'm a dog.
translation.de: Fangen wir vorne an. Ich bin Clarance, ein Hund.

translation.en: I'm Op and this is Ed and we are--
translation.de: Wir sind Op und Ed, wir sind…

translation.en: Uh, guys? Wait, wait, no, no. You don't understand. No.
translation.de: Leute, wartet. Ihr versteht das nicht.

translation.en: -[door closes] -[gasps] He's gonna eat a flummel!
We won't let you die, brother.
Guys, guys, guys, it's just a donut.
I have to admit, we're pretty delicious.
translation.de: Ich muss zugeben, wir sind lecker.

translation.en: Yeah. I imagine you guys have a few questions.
You should probably ask "when" are we.
translation.de: Ihr solltet wahrscheinlich fragen, "wann" wir sind.

translation.en: No. We're gonna stick with where are we. Yeah. Where?
Uh, this will take some visual aid.
Oh, I know just the place to get you some answers. Follow me.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wo es Antworten gibt. Folgt mir.

translation.en: I don't know what these are, but I finally feel like we belong to something.
translation.de: Etwas sagt mir, hier gehören wir dazu.

translation.en: Ugh, it makes my skin crawl.
[pants] What are we looking at here? We found us's.
And as usual, they're ignoring us.

translation.de: Hey, es ist Charlie! Wie läuft's?

translation.en: So, what's going on here? Guys, guys, relax.
This is the Hall of Extinct Creatures.
translation.de: Das ist die Halle der ausgestorbenen Kreaturen.

translation.en: Okay. I mean, the Hall of Extinct Creatures.
I have no idea. I just joined.
translation.de: Weiß nicht. Ich trat einfach bei.

translation.en: Well, you see it began with-- I guess I could--
translation.de: Also, es fing damit an…Ich könnte…

translation.en: Oh, you know what, I'll just let this thing do it.
A ship cuts across the sea toward destinies unknown.
translation.de: Ein Schiff fährt auf dem Meer ins Ungewisse.

translation.en: That's the thing I saw before we fell into the flower.
translation.de: Das sah ich, bevor wir herkamen.

translation.en: We are the Beagle of His Majesty's royal fleet.
translation.de: Wir sind die Beagle der königlichen Flotte.

translation.en: That's Charles Darwin, author of On the Origin of Species.
translation.de: Charles Darwin schrieb Über die Entstehung der Arten

translation.en: Right now, I'm studying the Galapagos
where I've just discovered a previously unknown island.
[man] Unfortunately, the island volcano erupted before they got there.
translation.de: Leider brach dieser Vulkan aus, bevor sie ankamen.

translation.en: was a single sliver of beach.
That's not even the best part of the beach.
On the island, Darwin discovered the remains
He theorized that the entire flummel species
translation.de: Er nahm an, dass die gesamte Spezies

translation.en: It doesn't make any sense. Everyone was just fine.
translation.de: Wie? Das ergibt keinen Sinn. Allen ging es gut. Wir waren da.
Allen ging es gut. Wir waren da.

translation.en: So, we're in the future in a place called "Shanghai".
translation.de: Wir sind in der Zukunft in der Stadt "Shanghai",

translation.en: And all of the other flummels are... gone?
translation.de: und es gibt keine Flummels mehr?

translation.en: No more Jepson? No more little Bo.
No more that guy whose name we don't know.
Normally, I'd be excited that we just rhymed.
translation.de: Nicht mal der Reim macht Spaß.

translation.en: Well, worry a little, but either way, stick with the dog.
translation.de: Oder ein bisschen, aber bleibt beim Hund.
Das ist Sun, Dr. Chungs Frau.

translation.en: Really knows how to scratch a tummy.
and used them to travel through time
before he got lost somehow, somewhere.
Anyway, the answer to all your problems is right through here. So, come on.
translation.de: Aber die Lösung für eure Probleme liegt hier. Also los.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. I'm not going through that thing again.
translation.de: Da gehe ich nicht wieder rein.

translation.en: What if we end up Dr. Chung-ed?

translation.de: Hey, ihr seid in guten Händen.

translation.en: Okay. Paws, but front paws, get it?
Thanks to me, Sun hasn't even noticed that Dr. Chung is missing.
translation.de: Sun weiß nicht mal, dass Chung weg ist.

translation.en: A place neither in the past nor the future.
Dr. Chung discovered that each one of these portals
translation.de: Dr. Chung entdeckte, dass diese Portale

translation.en: leads to a different time flower somewhere in history.
translation.de: zu Zeitblumen in der Geschichte führen.

translation.en: And now he's just showing off.
All we have to do is find the seed that activates the Galapagos portal,
translation.de: Wir brauchen den Samen für Galapagos,

translation.en: and you'll be on your way home.
No, home before the volcanic explosion,
translation.de: Nein, vor dem Ausbruch, dann warnen wir alle.
Nein, vor dem Ausbruch, dann warnen wir alle. Warnen?

translation.en: How are the flummels gonna trust us with their lives
translation.de: Sie sollen uns ihr Leben anvertrauen,

translation.en: when they don't even trust us with their flowers?
Remember when I told you "look to the future"?
translation.de: Ich sagte doch "blick in die Zukunft"?

translation.en: This is that future because we're the only ones
translation.de: Das ist die Zukunft, denn wir können die Flummels vor dem Aussterben retten.

translation.en: who can save the flummels from extinction.
translation.de: denn wir können die Flummels vor dem Aussterben retten.

translation.en: We're gonna stand out... as heroes.
But if we're gonna do this, we have to do it right.
-Not this one or this one. Not this one. -[worried grunting]
No, actually, I'm doing it all right.
-[electrical hissing] -I found it! I found the seed for it.
translation.de: Ich habe den richtigen Samen gefunden.

translation.en: Maybe we're supposed to be extinct.
This is horrible. I got to get out of here. Oh.
I'm Ernest Shackleton, head of the Ernest Shackleton Expedition.
translation.de: Ich bin Ernest Shackleton, Leiter dieser Expedition.

translation.en: Now, don't worry, you're with friends,
part of a team, team Ernest Shackleton.
Hello. I'm Clarance. And you are?
translation.de: Hallo. Ich bin Clarance. Und ihr?

translation.en: [all] We are all here to serve Master.
What are you two? Monsters? Space aliens?
We're none of those things. We're Op and Ed, we're--
translation.de: Nichts davon. Wir sind Op und Ed, wir…

translation.en: They appear to be a pair of flummels, Flummelios Hidella, to be exact.
translation.de: Sie scheinen Flummels zu sein. Flummelius Hidelia.

translation.en: The Germans refer to them as... [speaking German]
They all went extinct in the early 19th century.
My anxious friend here is Burnie, and he's a Tasmanian tiger,
translation.de: Das ist Burnie, ein tasmanischer Tiger.

translation.en: and Alma is a meridian gelada.
They're new and small and new.
And this is Hoss. He's from the Cretaceous Period.
translation.de: Das ist Hoss. Aus der Kreidezeit.

translation.en: So, he's millions of years old, but also he's only five.
translation.de: Er ist Millionen Jahre alt, und er ist fünf.

translation.en: We'd be happy to tell you all about everything.
We have a nice glossy brochure or...
So you're wondering what it means To be an extinctable
translation.de: Ihr fragt euch also Was ist ein Aussterblicher

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid the answer Starts with the unthinkable
translation.de: Die Antwort lautet Kaum etwas ist schmerzlicher

translation.en: But lucky for us Dr. Chung arrived
He brought us here Where it's safe and warm
translation.de: Und dann hat uns der nette

translation.en: And sheltered us from major storm
Now we call this strange place home
And honestly prefer not to roam
We know staying here Feels like a crime
When we could explore anyplace in time
Maybe visit Pompeii Before it went to rubble
Nope This place is not worth the trouble
But the world's full of danger And life is unfair
translation.de: Die Welt ist gefährlich Also bleiben wir hier

translation.en: So you can kill time here Or time will kill you out there
translation.de: Schlag lieber hier die Zeit tot Sonst tut sie es mit dir

translation.en: There's plague and famine Germs by the pound
Virus and disease No cure to be found
There's wars and swords And tyrants abound
Aliens, Bigfoot The Earth isn't round
Get crushed, blown up Or fall deathly ill
translation.de: Gefahr überall Solange die Welt sich dreht

translation.en: For the world's full of danger And life is unfair
translation.de: Die Welt ist gefährlich Also bleiben wir hier

translation.en: So you can kill time here Or time will kill you out there
translation.de: Schlag lieber hier die Zeit tot Sonst tut sie es mit dir

translation.en: The bulldog rat, the Aztec cat
Giant goose and the great stag moose
The large sloth lemur The Pleistocene beaver
The Russian retriever Guys, I wish you could've seen it
'Cause no matter the name They're all out of the game
It's a Japanese sea lion crying shame
It could happen any year In any hemisphere
If you wanna stay safe Best stay right here
translation.de: Es gibt keinen Ort Der sicher wäre

translation.en: For the world's full of danger
You can kill time here or
translation.de: Schlag lieber hier die Zeit tot, sonst

translation.en: Time can kill you out there
You know, I feel Clarance would've really gotten a kick out of that.
translation.de: Ich glaube, Clarance hätte das gefallen.

translation.en: Uh, the portals just went crazy
and... and then Clarance flew away...
This is a new record, Op.
We've been here all of ten minutes, and everybody already hates us.
translation.de: Sie hassen uns schon nach zehn Minuten.

translation.en: It's fine. It'll all be fine.
Ed and I will get Clarance and the seed back.
translation.de: Wir finden Clarance und den Samen.

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but there's no telling where or when Clarance might be.
translation.de: Aber keiner weiß, wo und wann Clarance sein könnte.

translation.en: Not to mention, he may be taken by body snatchers,
Burnie. The point is, Clarance could be anywhere, literally.
Doesn't he have to be in one of those places?
to these dozens of unknown and dangerous places
in hopes of stumbling across Clarance by sheer dumb luck?
translation.de: in der Hoffnung, Clarance zu finden?

translation.en: Sounds like a plan to me.
Did she say "dangerous"? Did you say "dangerous"?
Hello, sir. Have you seen a cute little doggy around here?
translation.de: Hallo. Haben Sie einen Hund gesehen?

translation.en: No sign of Clarance, and we almost got killed.
translation.de: Kein Clarance, und es war knapp.

translation.en: This is why I don't like to travel.
Come on, Ed. We've got a lot more places to check,
Hi, me. Oh, no. There's a hole right through me.
translation.de: Hallo, ich! Oh nein, ich habe ein Loch.

translation.en: [laughs] Just messing. I know that's how I look.
Bound to be the eventual death of me?
Okay, Ed. I've got a great feeling about this next portal.
translation.de: Okay, Ed. Ich habe ein gutes Gefühl.

translation.en: [laughs] That lady really didn't like us trying on her hat.
translation.de: Den Hut hat sie uns nicht gegönnt.

translation.en: History must be a non-stop adventure.

translation.de: Wie ist es so da draußen?

translation.en: Each place is more exciting than the last.
you do not want to leave here where it's safe.
translation.de: bleib lieber hier, wo es sicher ist.

translation.en: And Op, he's just a kid.
translation.de: Op, er ist noch ein Kind.

translation.en: You should stop putting ideas in his head.
translation.de: Setz ihm keine Flausen in den Kopf.

translation.en: But I want ideas in my head.
translation.de: Aber ich will Flausen im Kopf.

translation.en: I'm so cooped up in here.
I know what will knock the glum right outta ya.
Live from inside Dr. Chung's mobile greenhouse,
translation.de: Live aus Dr. Chungs mobilem Gewächshaus,
hier ist Burnie, der Australier mit Ausstrahlung.

translation.en: First, I'll need a common household item.
Now, I place the object between the two Time Flowers
translation.de: Ich stelle das Objekt zwischen die Zeitblumen

translation.en: Where'd it go? Where'd it go?
It'll be back in three, two, one, and...
translation.de: Er kommt zurück in drei, zwei, eins und…

translation.en: A magician never reveals his secrets.
translation.de: Ein Zauberer verrät nie seine Geheimnisse.

translation.en: The merging of two Time Flowers
causes an extremely powerful arc that disassembles the atoms of an item,
sends them into a time loop, then reassembles the item at a different point in time.
translation.de: und setzen sie zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt zusammen.

translation.en: All we do, we do for Master.
translation.de: Wir tun alles nur für Herrchen.

translation.en: Well, uh, I think I heard Master say
you two should snap my leash so I can go free.
[sighs] This did not go how I hoped.
Clarance, where are you? I don't see him, Op.
translation.de: -Clarance, wo bist du? -Ich sehe ihn nicht, Op.

translation.en: But I do see a pretty good wall.
translation.de: Aber ich sehe eine hohe Mauer.

translation.en: On second thought, a great wall.
Imagine if we brought these back to the flummels. [laughs]
We have a lot of mess ahead of us, and you keep making the mess messier.
translation.de: Wir sitzen in der Tinte, und du machst sie tintiger.

translation.en: You just don't think things through.
I mean, we've been lucky so far,
but one of these days, you're gonna get someone hurt,
From now on, we don't do anything unless we're both onboard.
translation.de: Ab jetzt entscheiden wir alles gemeinsam.

translation.en: It's been a while. You do think they're okay out there?
translation.de: Sie sind lange weg. Ob es ihnen gut geht?

translation.en: Barely. Those sky flowers tried to kill us.
These are fireworks. The Chinese invented them.
They also invented the gunpowder inside them.
They came from the Qianlong Coronation.
translation.de: Das ist von der Krönung von Qianlong.
Ihr wart im China des Jahres 1736.

translation.en: So... where you two going next?
translation.de: Also, wo geht ihr als Nächstes hin?

translation.en: If that's the one you want, then I love it. Thank you.
translation.de: -Wenn du den willst, bin ich dafür. -Danke.

translation.en: Let's hope it's the right one, for the flummels' sake.
translation.de: Hoffentlich führt er zu den Flummels.

translation.en: They have no idea our entire species is doomed.
translation.de: Sie ahnen nicht, dass wir verloren sind.

translation.en: I can't believe you guys found me.
You're better explorers than this Shackleton guy.
Oh, you'll be happy to know I kept this safe.
translation.de: Den habe ich für euch aufbewahrt.

translation.en: -Good. What's the plan? -Yeah. What's the plan?
No, no, no. She wouldn't abandon us. We just talked about this.
translation.de: Würde sie nie. Wir sprachen darüber.

translation.en: And Op just promised me that she wouldn't do this kind of thing anymore.
translation.de: Sie versprach, so etwas nicht mehr zu tun.

translation.en: She'll be back. She's probably just gonna just--
translation.de: Sie kommt wieder. Sicher ist sie nur…

translation.en: Okay. She might have abandoned us.
Op runs off, and I'm left pounding a rock.
translation.de: Op haut ab und ich klopfe Steine.

translation.en: Hoss, see that shiny necklace on Clarance?
We can't get home without that seed. Hoss, circle back around.
translation.de: Wir brauchen den Samen. Hoss, wenden!

translation.en: Back into the Time Flower, Hoss, and step on it.
translation.de: Zurück zur Zeitblume, Hoss. Gib Gas!

translation.en: Do you know how to play this game?
translation.de: Weißt du, wie man das spielt?

translation.en: Hey, have you guys seen Hoss?
-[piano keys clang off-key] -[Mozart] Was ist das?
You almost got him extinct. Not to mention the rest of us.
translation.de: Er wäre fast ausgestorben. Wir anderen auch.

translation.en: That's right, you didn't think, and you didn't listen.
translation.de: -Ich dachte nicht… -Genau. Nicht gedacht oder zugehört.

translation.en: Even though you looked me in the eye
translation.de: Dabei sahst du mir in die Augen

translation.en: and promised me that you wouldn't do anything unless we were both onboard.
translation.de: und hast mir versprochen, wir entscheiden gemeinsam.

translation.en: All this time I thought I never fit in with the flummels because there was something wrong with me.
translation.de: Ich dachte immer, etwas stimmt nicht mit mir.

translation.en: I'm saying that my life would be better off without you!
translation.de: Ich sage, ich wäre ohne dich besser dran!

translation.en: I'm sure he just needs some time to cool off.
Ed's right. I am the problem.
translation.de: Ed hat recht. Ich bin das Problem.

translation.en: And he is better off without me.
translation.de: Ohne mich ist er besser dran.

translation.en: But there's one thing I can still do.
-I'm going back to warn the flummels. -Oh, whoa, whoa, whoa.
I'm not sure you should go without Ed.
I'd just end up causing him more trouble,
and I've caused him enough trouble already.
If I can pull this off, then Ed will have a community to go home to.
translation.de: Wenn ich es schaffe, hat Ed ein Zuhause.

translation.en: at least I can't hurt him again.
[Mali] You know, you're also a great leader on the dance floor.
translation.de: Sogar beim Tanzen kannst du gut führen.

translation.en: Thanks, Mali. You've said that about five times already.
little reminder, this is the Flower Festival.
translation.de: zur Erinnerung, das ist das Blumenfestival.

translation.en: Second reminder, you've been banned from the Flower Festival.
I don't have time for the whole story, but I need everyone's attention.
translation.de: Ich habe nicht viel Zeit, aber hört alle mal her.

translation.en: I am trying to get my kids to sleep in here.
-[baby crying] -Oh, now, I'm up all night. Thanks.
translation.de: Jetzt bin ich die ganze Nacht wach. Danke.

translation.en: I just returned from the future. and I learned that in the past,
translation.de: Ich komme gerade aus der Zukunft. In der Vergangenheit,

translation.en: and by the past I mean now,
our entire species is about to stop existing.
translation.de: hört unsere ganze Spezies auf zu existieren.

translation.en: So, if we're going to live to see the future,
we have to do something now, which is in the past.
translation.de: müssen wir jetzt etwas tun. In der Vergangenheit.

translation.en: We're all about to go extinct.
Everyone, I promise you. Op, you're being ridiculous.
translation.de: Ich verspreche es euch. Op, das ist lächerlich.

translation.en: That's why I made this face because you're ridiculous.
I'm telling you, it's true. I--I swear on this conch.
translation.de: Ich schwöre es bei dieser Muschel.

translation.en: Oh, no. Don't drag me into this.
Look, here's proof I was in the future.
translation.de: Hier ist etwas aus der Zukunft.

translation.en: -Why did I think this would work? -[screams]
Wow, you really let her have it.
translation.de: Der hast du es aber gezeigt.

translation.en: Remind me to never get on your bad side.
translation.de: Vor dir kann man Angst haben.

translation.en: But don't you think you were maybe a little bit hard on her?
translation.de: Aber warst du nicht ein bisschen zu streng?

translation.en: She is your sister after all.
No. It's been like this our whole lives.
translation.de: Nein. So war es unser Leben lang.

translation.en: Maybe I shouldn't have said it out loud,
translation.de: Ich habe es nie laut gesagt,

translation.en: My life would be much better without her.
translation.de: Ohne sie wäre ich besser dran.

translation.en: This is a place of withouts.
We all live here without our families, without friends.
translation.de: Wir leben hier ohne unsere Familie, ohne Freunde.

translation.en: Sometimes, I think, without really living at all.
translation.de: Manchmal denke ich, ohne wirklich zu leben.

translation.en: But I can tell you this,
life is really tough when you're all by yourself.
translation.de: ganz allein ist das Leben hart.

translation.en: ...messing. I know that's how I look. [chuckles]
Hey, Ed. Ed, are you seeing this?
Could someone give me a hand with this?
Hey, check it out, I'm the friend at the end.
translation.de: Hey, seht mal. Ich bin der Freund am Ende.

translation.en: Hey, Wally, get over here, buddy.
I have to talk to Op.
I wanted to ask Op if she'd sign it, too,
but she left in kind of a hurry.
I think she said something about going home.
Gave us a lot to think about.
But let's be honest, truthful, real truthful,
translation.de: Aber seien wir mal ganz ehrlich.

translation.en: you never went to the future.
translation.de: Du warst nie in der Zukunft.

translation.en: And I can attest to it.
I don't know, but sick do.
part--it's hard to know. My mother was very social.
translation.de: teils… wer weiß. Meine Mutter war gesellig.

translation.en: [gasps] You came! You've gotta tell the flummels they're in trouble.
translation.de: Erzähl den Flummels von dem Problem.

translation.en: Oh, they most certainly are in trouble...
Hey, wait! Where are you going?
translation.de: Hey, warte! Wo willst du hin?

translation.en: Okay. So, she might have been telling the truth.
translation.de: Okay. Vielleicht hat sie doch die Wahrheit gesagt.

translation.en: And why did you do this?
Hate, hate, hate, hate, hate hate, hate! Flummels ruined my life!
translation.de: Hass! Flummels haben mein Leben ruiniert!

translation.en: I was a puppy once, adorable and spunky,
translation.de: Ich war einmal ein niedlicher Welpe

translation.en: just waiting for a family to take me home.
But unfortunately, I lived in a world of flummels.
translation.de: Aber leider lebte ich in einer Welt mit Flummels.

translation.en: And flummels were the most popular pet in the world.
translation.de: Und Flummels waren das beliebteste Haustier der Welt.

translation.en: I get it. Nobody wanted a dog with a stomach.
translation.de: Ich verstehe. Niemand wollte einen Hund mit Magen.

translation.en: But then, one day, my luck changed.
translation.de: Aber eines Tages hatte ich endlich Glück.

translation.en: [Dr. Chung] He's perfect. I'll take him.
translation.de: Er ist perfekt. Ich nehme ihn.

translation.en: [Clarance] I couldn't believe it. This man wanted me.
And he even loved me enough to give me a name.
translation.de: Er gab mir sogar einen Namen.

translation.en: You're coming home with me, Clarance.
translation.de: Du kommst mit mir nach Hause, Clarance.

translation.en: [Clarance] I was expecting a warm bed, and a fresh pile of newspapers.
translation.de: Ich erwartete ein Bett und frische Zeitungen.
Sitz. Aber ich bekam etwas Besseres.

translation.en: -I got something better. -[Dr. Chung] Good boy.
translation.de: Aber ich bekam etwas Besseres. Braver Hund.

translation.en: [Clarance] It was then that I realized I was more than just a pet.
translation.de: Ich war mehr als nur ein Haustier.

translation.en: I was a part of science.
[man] It's the top of the fifth inning as the Bambino steps to the plate.
He's pointing to a dog on a tiny little car.
translation.de: Er zeigt auf einen Hund im Auto.

translation.en: Oh, Doctor, I don't believe it.
I finally felt I belonged somewhere,
adventuring through time and history together.
[Clarance] But then, one day, we traveled to 1835,
translation.de: Aber eines Tages reisten wir nach 1835

translation.en: And there we found a bunch of these stupid napkin rings.
translation.de: Und da fanden wir euch blöde Serviettenringe.

translation.en: [Clarance] Dr. Chung told me this was when Darwin first discovered flummels
translation.de: Laut Dr. Chung entdeckte Darwin hier die Flummels

translation.en: and introduced them to the rest of the world.
[Dr. Chung] Oh, my goodness, look at you.
He was gonna love flummels more than me.
translation.de: Er würde sie mehr lieben als ich.

translation.en: And then it hit me. I didn't have to accept the course of history.
translation.de: Aber ich musste die Geschichte nicht erdulden.

translation.en: Ready for our next adventure, Clarance?
[Clarance] Yeah, that's right. I turned on my master.
translation.de: Ich stellte mich gegen mein Herrchen.

translation.en: I pushed him though a portal and made sure he could never come back.
translation.de: Ich schubste ihn durch ein Portal und verhinderte seine Rückkehr.

translation.en: After that, there was nothing stopping me from coming back here
Now, back to some smooth jazz.
[Clarance] It was a quick trip, but I got a lot done that day.
And it was all a done deal until you two hula-hoops showed up.
translation.de: Die Sache war gelaufen, bis ihr aufgetaucht seid.

translation.en: But it's all about to be fixed,
because your brother is back with the other cowards
translation.de: weil den Bruder bei den anderen ist,

translation.en: who never leave their precious, little Time Terminal.
And you're not getting off this island alive.
translation.de: Und du kommst hier nicht weg.

translation.en: That's more time than I thought. I mean it's not a lot of time but--
translation.de: Das ist mehr Zeit, als ich dachte.

translation.en: Yeah. I meant to only set it for three.
You know what, it don't matter.
You've got a front row seat to your species' and your own extinction.
translation.de: Du erlebst das Aussterben deiner Rasse und von dir.

translation.en: She's too funny to stay mad at.
translation.de: Man kann ihr nicht böse sein.

translation.en: I just returned with the last Tasmanian tiger on Earth.
translation.de: Ich fand soeben den letzten Tasmanischen Tiger.

translation.en: It scratched me up pretty good.
What? I don't get into cars with strangers.
translation.de: Ich steige nicht zu Fremden ins Auto.

translation.en: [gasps] That's the day he went missing.
Today, I'm visiting one of my heroes,
He created one of the first nautical maps ever.
translation.de: Er schuf eine der ersten Seekarten.

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe I'll even get to see him drawing it up.
translation.de: Vielleicht kann ich ihm dabei zusehen.

translation.en: We know where he went now.
[Dr. Chung] Ready for your next adventure, Clarance?
What kind of conspiracy nut am I if I didn't see that coming?
translation.de: Nicht mal ich hätte das gedacht.

translation.en: But we could still save Dr. Chung if we just use whatever seeds...
translation.de: Wir können Dr. Chung retten, mit dem Samen…

translation.en: Oh, I can't believe we finally know where Dr. Chung is,
translation.de: Wir wissen, wo Dr. Chung ist,

translation.en: and there's no way to bring him back.
No, no. Dr. Chung said he was going to 1417, remember?
translation.de: Dr. Chung sagte doch, er reist nach 1417, weißt du noch?
Ja, um Zheng He zu besuchen,

translation.en: which means he probably joined his expedition to Malacca, 1418,
translation.de: also reiste er bestimmt 1418 mit ihm nach Malakka,

translation.en: We just need some sort of beacon to lead him to it.
We should also give him the brochure.
I'm so sorry, I didn't mean...
A volcano didn't make us extinct.

translation.de: Es war Clarance mit der Bombe.

translation.en: and now he's trapped the others in the cave,
and he trapped me against this tree and...
because we both didn't agree that it is.
I was so wrong to say what I said,
and I want you to know that I didn't mean it.
translation.de: Ich habe es nicht so gemeint.

translation.en: All you've ever done is support me,
and my life would be nothing without you.
translation.de: und mein Leben wäre nichts ohne dich.

translation.en: What are you talking about? I can't do anything right.
translation.de: Wovon redest du? Ich mache nichts richtig.

translation.en: You know it. I know it, the rest of the flummels certainly know it and--
translation.de: Wir wissen es, die anderen Flummels auch…

translation.en: Who cares what the flummels think?
worried about fitting in with all the other flummels
that I never even noticed this is where I fit in best.
translation.de: dass ich nicht merkte, wo ich hingehöre.

translation.en: Come on, I screw up all the time.
translation.de: Komm, ich mache immer nur Mist.

translation.en: But if it weren't for your screw-ups, then we would've never even fallen through that flower.
translation.de: Aber ohne deinen Mist wären wir nie durch die Blume gefallen.

translation.en: we have a chance to rescue our species from extinction.
translation.de: können wir uns vor dem Aussterben retten.

translation.en: We're gonna save the flummels, because they'd do the same thing for us if it were the other way around.
translation.de: Wir retten die Flummels, denn sie würden es auch für uns tun.

translation.en: [sighs] You think you can get me out of this thing?
No problem. There's only a million combinations here.
translation.de: Es gibt nur eine Million Kombinationen.

translation.en: Thanks, guys. Next time I poke you, it's gonna be a lot softer.
translation.de: Danke, Leute. Ich werde euch sanfter schubsen.

translation.en: Come on, Op, we're not gonna let that adorable maniac get away with this.
translation.de: Komm Op, wir müssen den niedlichen Irren stoppen.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. It can't be.
translation.de: Oh nein. Das kann nicht sein.

translation.en: -Why won't these flummels just die? -[glass shatters]
Looks like I may need some help.
How much time before the bomb goes off?
I know it wants to kill us
but you have to admit, it is helpful.
Don't worry. You'll be long gone by then.
translation.de: Bis dahin seid ihr längst hin.

translation.en: What are you gonna do, fuzzball?
There's only one you and two us's.
translation.de: Du bist allein, wir sind zwei.

translation.en: And in case you were wondering if ancient Greek monsters are real,
Okay, Greg, you know what to do.
I just drove for the first time and so far, I've only hit one pedestrian.
translation.de: Ich habe nur einen Fußgänger überfahren.

translation.en: The best decision I've made in a long time.
Crikey, that one eye makes for pretty poor depth perception.
translation.de: Mit einem Auge kann er nicht zielen.

translation.en: He couldn't hit the broadside of a Hoss.
Hey, Cyclops, bet you can't hit me. -Bet you can't hit me. -Hmm?
translation.de: Hey, Zyklop, du triffst mich nicht!

translation.en: Need a target? Hundred points if you get it through the bull's-eye.
-Hey, put some sauce on that meatball. -[all taunting]
translation.de: Tu etwas Soße an den Klops! Komm schon, du Heini! Na los!
Komm schon, du Heini! Na los!

translation.en: He is a very, very, very ugly wet-looking dog.
translation.de: Er ist ein hässlicher nasser Hund.

translation.en: So, I spent a lot of my cave time thinking about you two,
translation.de: Ich habe in der Höhle viel über euch nachgedacht,

translation.en: and what I would do if we ever got out of there alive.
translation.de: und was ich tun will, falls ich rauskomme.

translation.en: You think maybe we could do this later?
The whole island is about to blow up.
The only thing we can do.
and then we do whatever they say.
The ship, that's Charles Darwin, the man from the museum movie.
translation.de: Das ist Charles Darwin, aus dem Museumsfilm.

translation.en: [gasps] If we make it to the beach, he might be able to save us.
translation.de: Er könnte uns am Strand retten.

translation.en: Wait, I know what that means, and it's good.
translation.de: Das Wort kenne ich, es ist gut.

translation.en: Is something wrong with them? They don't have any holes.
Jepson, you get everyone to the beach.
We'll meet you there after we get Darwin's attention with the sky flowers.
translation.de: Wir alarmieren Darwin mit den Himmelsblumen.

translation.en: Uh, but these flummels haven't been sanitized.
Wait. I just wanna say thanks for everything,
translation.de: Warte. Ich will nur danke sagen.

translation.en: and try not to fall to your death.
What do you think I am, a dodo?
Oh, because they look like flowers in the sky.
Hey, tell whoever came up with that name, great job.
translation.de: Da hat jemand einen guten Namen gefunden.

translation.en: Can we go? Please, please, please, please, please?
[sighs] Fine. But this is the last island.
translation.de: Gut. Aber das ist die letzte Insel.

translation.en: He sees us! Op and Ed did it!
translation.de: Er sieht uns! Op und Ed haben es geschafft!

translation.en: Whoa, that felt weird to say.
Ah, now, that's the Op and Ed I know.
translation.de: So kenne ich Op und Ed.

translation.en: Yeah, who'd have thought our aim would be too good?
You don't wanna eat us. Just eat me. Let Ed live.
translation.de: Iss uns nicht. Nur mich. Lass Ed leben.

translation.en: -Hmm? -[Ed] That's nice what you said out there, you know, outside of the mouth.
translation.de: Das war sehr nett von dir, vor dem Mund.

translation.en: I hope he swallows me first just so you can live a little longer.
[Ed] I hope he swallows me first.
I don't wanna see you swallowed.
We're alive and smell like Cyclops's breath.
translation.de: Wir sind am Leben und riechen nach Zyklop.

translation.en: Behind that big eye is an even bigger heart.
translation.de: Ein großes Auge und ein großes Herz.

translation.en: And by the way, you have a cavity.
Op, I don't think that ship is gonna get here in time to save us.
translation.de: Op, das Schiff wird nicht rechtzeitig hier sein.

translation.en: [Ed] So the Cyclops will throw us to the Time Flower,
translation.de: Der Zyklop wirft uns zur Zeitblume,

translation.en: we'll take it to the beach,
and we'll take everyone through it before the bomb goes off.
Hey, you can do it, big guy. We believe in you.
translation.de: Du schaffst das. Wir glauben an dich.

translation.en: Nice aim, Greg. You're a natural.
If I didn't know any better,
I'd say these creatures are trying to communicate with us.
Perhaps they're adapting to the changes around them in order to survive.
translation.de: Vielleicht passen sie sich ihrer Umwelt an.

translation.en: Almost as if they're, I don't know, evolving or something.
translation.de: In einer Art Evolution oder so.

translation.en: and there's only gonna be one survivor, and that's me.
So, hand over that Time Flower.
-Nice Op Hop. -I learned from the best.
Dang, I always forget about this cliff.
I might have one, and it's kind of an Op idea.
You almost got us killed, Ed. Whoa.
translation.de: Du hast uns fast umgebracht, Ed.

translation.en: Is this how I make you feel all the time?
translation.de: Geht es dir so mit mir?

translation.en: Time Flowers. How many times did you hit your head on the way down?
translation.de: Wie oft hast du dir den Kopf angeschlagen?

translation.en: Okay. Great. Now we have three Time Flowers.
Something other than lighting a boat on fire.
-Do you think this will work? -I have no idea.
I got to get this bomb away from me.
my great-great-grandfather sailed here with the one and only Charles Darwin.
translation.de: segelte mein Urahn hier mit Charles Darwin.

translation.en: He claimed that there was an island here that exploded and completely vanished.
translation.de: Angeblich gab es hier eine Insel, die explodierte.

translation.en: Yeah. I think I had a relative that did something like that, too.
translation.de: Ja. So einen Verwandten hatte ich auch.

translation.en: Oh, or at least I'm alive.
Oh! Hoss and everybody, you're alive!
Yes, thanks to Op and Ed,
So... were you worried about me?
Burnie's trick on a grand scale. We used every Time Flower we could find
translation.de: Burnies Trick in groß. Mit den Zeitblumen ließen wir die Insel

translation.en: to make the whole island disappear before the boat went off.
I was right about the flowers and the Cyclops.
What else am I right about?
I'll just get back in that flower, and I'll keep trying again and again
translation.de: Ich springe wieder in die Blume und versuche es weiter,

translation.en: It worked. Dr. Chung made it back!
translation.de: Es hat geklappt. Dr. Chung ist zurück!

translation.en: You've been a very bad dog, Clarance.
translation.de: Du warst ein sehr böser Hund, Clarance.

translation.en: Oh, it's so good to see you and you, and you, and...
translation.de: Oh, es ist so schön, dich zu sehen, und dich und

translation.en: I think you should be asking "when" are--
Today, we celebrate the one-year anniversary
of the greatest discovery of the 21st century,
a species once thought extinct, flummels.
translation.de: den Flummels, die als ausgestorben galten.
Ja, die knuddeligen, niedlichen, liebenswerten Flummels,

translation.en: brought to us by famed botanical astrophysicist, Dr. Lee Chung.
translation.de: entdeckt vom berühmten Astrophysiker Dr. Lee Chung.

translation.en: A recent survey shows that the average...
Oh, I'm so proud of you, Lee.
And you've been so much more talkative since your discovery.
translation.de: Und du bist viel gesprächiger geworden.

translation.en: Friend at the end again, eh? Nope.
Aww, and all without my help.
You and Dr. Chung visit any cool places lately? [Op] You bet we have.
translation.de: -Hast du mit Chung was Tolles erlebt? -Und ob.

translation.en: It's been one amazing adventure after another.
[Ed] What did you guys end up doing with Clarance? [Op] Oh, he's cooling off.
translation.de: -Was wurde aus Clarance? -Der kühlt sich ab.

translation.en: No dog should have a master.
So, on the count of three,
I say we tie up Shackleton, take his ship,
and head somewhere warm like Cabo.
translation.de: und nach Cabo segeln, wo es warm ist.

translation.en: Okay. Okay. We can change it up.
They let dogs in the restaurants there. [yelps]
Ready or not, Hoss, here I come.
And thanks for helping out, pals.
Well, how do you like this year's two flower floats?
translation.de: Wie gefallen euch unsere zwei Blumenwagen?

translation.en: -[Op] Great. -[Ed] I look a little chunky.
I'm sorry your teeth are yellow. We ran out of white flowers.
translation.de: Leider gab es nur gelbe Blumen für die Zähne.

translation.en: Hey, Ed, I have a little surprise for you. Come with me.
translation.de: Ed, ich habe eine Überraschung für dich. Komm mit.

translation.en: Except I just remembered that I don't,
so tell me what it is so I'm not too surprised.
Don't worry, Ed. I'm sure you have plenty of time to prepare for--
translation.de: Keine Sorge, Ed. Du hast noch viel Zeit, um dich…

translation.en: Op, I really don't know if I could handle another surprise today.
translation.de: Noch eine Überraschung vertrage ich heute nicht.

translation.en: Trust me. You're gonna love it.
Hey, I haven't seen you since, what, like 1835?
translation.de: Hey, ich habe dich seit 1835 nicht gesehen.

translation.en: There's so much to talk about.
translation.de: Es gibt so viel zu erzählen.

translation.en: You two keep going. I'll go get him a glass of water.
translation.de: Ich hole ihm ein Glas Wasser.
